text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's another ordinary day, and I<n>decide to take a stroll
through the<n>academy. As I pass by the student<n>dormitory,
however—

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Ahhhhh!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Waaaah! I'm sorry! I'm sorry! I'm<n>so, so sorry!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
From the halls of the Ritto dormitory, I<n>hear somebody
scream, followed by<n>what sounds like Matikanefukukitaru<n>
furiously apologizing.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... Somebody... Pleasehelp...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's you! Perfect timing! So I'm in<n>a bit of a kerfuffle... Do
you think you<n>could lend me a hand?
choice_data_list: It sounds like you're up to something...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: W-wait! Hear me out! You need to<n>help me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, we're in this together! The<n>great Shiraoki led you to
me for a<n>reason! Follow me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Without even waiting for my<n>response, Matikanefukukitaru
grabs<n>my hand and leads me to one of the<n>dorm rooms.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I look into the room, but my vision is<n>obscured by a giant
mountain of<n>garbage. The scream from earlier<n>must have
come from the now buried<n>roommate.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
None of this is trash! It's all my lucky<n>charms! I've spent
half my life<n>curating this magnificent collection!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Everything here is too valuable for<n>me to just throw away!
But my<n>treasure mound kind of toppled over<n>and may
have completely swallowed<n>my friend...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It's fine though! If I keep this up, I'll<n>have enough stuff to
cover all of<n>Tracen Academy! Or well... I think so,<n>at least.
choice_data_list: Here's a trash can we can use.
Here's a trash can we can use.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Whaaaaat?! How could you<n>say something so
blasphemous with<n>such a straight face?! I can't throw<n>
any of this away! Outta the question!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
You know these are my lucky<n>charms, right? The good
fortune I<n>receive from everything here is why<n>I'm at this
academy in the first place!<n>Throw it all away?! I would
never!
choice_data_list:
A mountain of lucky items doesn't sound safe
though.

A mountain of lucky items doesn't sound safe
though.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... I guess so... I mean, it'salready consumed its first victim...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Urgh... It pains me to admit it, but if the<n>trainer sent to me by
the great Shiraoki<n>tells me so, I suppose there's not<n>much
I can do...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
All right, then. I'll get rid of some of it.<n>Just a tiny bit though!
Only the stuff I<n>don't need!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After helping Matikanefukukitaru<n>gather the lucky items she
deems<n>unnecessary, we head to the<n>incinerator behind
the school building.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Awww, man... I can't believe I'm<n>burning my lucky
items—even a tiny<n>portion of them. How depressing...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... Okay, I think I'm ready...Where should we start?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Nooo, that charm helped me reach the<n>top eight in a ball
tournament back in<n>elementary school! Are you mad?!<n>We
can't start with something so<n>important!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
No way! Back when I was little, I<n>almost got run over by a
tricycle. That<n>doll got run over in my stead! Who<n>knows
what would happen if we<n>burned it?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That's the pudding cup from when I<n>was four and opened
one by myself<n>for the very first time! Burning that is<n>out of
question!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Argh, I can't do this! I'm begging<n>you, please don't make
me get rid of<n>my stuff... I'll do anything, I swear!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing Matikanefukukitaru fall to her<n>knees in despair, I
decide that burning<n>her possessions might not be for the<n>
best and take a step back from the<n>incinerator.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Every one of these lucky items is<n>dear to me... But at the
same time,<n>taking them back to my room would<n>just lead
to someone else getting<n>hurt...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
What should I do? Any suggestions?<n>I'll give you a wisdom
charm. Let's<n>think about it together...
choice_data_list: What if I held onto your stuff for you?
What if I held onto your stuff for you?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
You? Hold onto my stuff for me?<n>Would you really?! I'd
really<n>appreciate it! I don't mind sharing<n>luck with you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Seriously... What a huge relief... I was<n>worried for a second
there. Throwing<n>away even one of my lucky items<n>would
be... I-I don't want to think<n>about it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Y'know how I said I'd appreciate<n>you holding onto my stuff
for me<n>earlier? Well... I do, but... would it be<n>okay for me to
stop by once a week to<n>see my things?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much! I'm so glad it's<n>you who's watching
my stuff for me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Well, with that said... Good night! Take<n>good care of my
lucky items for me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Matikanefukukitaru bids her<n>belongings farewell and takes
her<n>leave, waving her white handkerchief<n>as she
reluctantly returns to her dorm<n>room.
